title: Cold Weather Warnings for the New Year
summary: In the UK, weather experts have issued warnings for snow and ice as 2026 begins. This cold spell is expected to last over a week, causing travel problems with snow and blizzards. People are advised to be careful when going out, especially on New Year's Eve and into the weekend. Temperatures dropped very low in places like Scotland and Wales, making it feel very cold. Health alerts have been raised to amber for all of England, warning that cold weather can be dangerous, especially for older or vulnerable people. It's important to stay warm and safe during this time.
